meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marcia Johnson Mark Nelson Chris Shea Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #931.

td.p: Mark Nelson, an Army officer from Hameln, West Germany
Chris Shea, a radio operator from Los Angeles, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $23,401)

tr.td: THE '50s
INVENTORS & INVENTIONS
AUTHORS
ANIMALS
SPORTSCASTERS
(Alex: And finally, we have an all-music category called...)
MOVIE THEMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'According to a popular ad, to keep your pompadour in place, a "little dab" of this would do you')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: According to a popular ad, to keep your pompadour in place, a "little dab" of this would do you

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alex: One minute to go in the round.)

waterproof

Mark
')

Mark

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Chris
Mark
Marcia
1ST FAMILY TRIVIA
ART
CHEMISTRY
QUOTES
U.S. GEOGRAPHY
(Alex: And finally, a very specialized category...)
SIR WALTER RALEIGH

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_3', 'clue_DJ_3_3_stuck', '(Mark: What is electrons?)
(Marcia: What are protons?)
[Alex waits several seconds before ruling Marcia wrong, apparently giving her an opportunity to amend her response that she did not take advantage of.]
...
(Alex: Mark and Marcia were all over that atom, but they didn\'t get the right response. We\'ve got less than a minute to go, Chris.)

protons & neutrons

ChrisMarkMarcia
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_3_3', 'clue_DJ_3_3_stuck', 'The atomic weight of an atom is the sum of the number of these in the nucleus')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The atomic weight of an atom is the sum of the number of these in the nucleus

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_4_3', 'clue_DJ_4_3_stuck', '[Alex gave the parenthetical part of the response.]

"(Let Me Be Your) Teddy Bear"

Mark
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Chris
Mark
Marcia

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Mark] Remember, the Olympics were in \'84, not \'86. That should\'ve been an important clue for you.)
MarciaWhat is the Olympic Ring Symbol?
$3,800
MarkWhat is this Olympic Symbol?
$5,800
ChrisWhat is the Statue of liberty
$5,301
the Statue of Liberty')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1986 Coke & Kodak were among 19 firms who pledged over $66 mil. to use its image in their ads')

tr.td: AMERICANA
In 1986 Coke & Kodak were among 19 firms who pledged over $66 mil. to use its image in their ads
Chris
Mark
Marcia
4-day champion: $35,202
2nd place: Krementz 14-karat gold signet rings for him & her engraved with your initials + Meade Model 310 telescope
3rd place: Helbros sports watches, hers with 14 genuine diamonds & his with 22
Chris
Mark
Marcia

16 R,
1 W
(including 1 DD)

21 R
(including 1 DD),
6 W

12 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
